subject: Re: Any eBay sellers willing to do this?
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Kay, as eBay really doesn't give you an option to post a "live" link, 
you may want to create an image file (.jpg) that can be uploaded.  It 
would be far easier to simply put something like, "Make this ghost 
box yourself for $25. at UFOGeek.com" on a sign pictured beside the 
radio.

If you get 'em to UFOGeek.com, they can figure it out from there.  
Unfortunately, many of the people buying those radios are probably 
thinking it to be difficult to do the alteration.

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "psfponies" <psfponies@...> wrote:
>
> I am open to any ideas. I am just trying to figure out the best way 
> to list just the hack information.
> 
> Kay

> > Hi Kay.  I think it should be a brief description on how to do 
all

> >

> > 12-469 current

> > 12-820 current
> > 20-125 current

> > having to ship, that would be totally worth it.  Unlimited

> > list - 9 days?) would reach a heck of a lot more people than

> > 
> > Margaret
